DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study examine efficacy probiotic-based product either reduce hypertension prevent high normal blood pressure reach hypertensive level .
DOC.criteria: Healthy individual age 4075 year . Bloodpressure > 140/90 mmHg confirm 23 separate occasion represent mean value 24hour measurement . Triglycerides > 1,7 mmol/L and/or HDL < 1 mmol/L ( men ) /1,29 mmol/L ( woman ) . Fasting plasma glucose level > 5,6 mmol/L and/or waist circumference > 102 cm ( men ) /88 cm ( woman ) . BMI < 40 . Medically treated allergy allergy ingredient study product . Medication high level blood lipid . Metabolic disease , type one diabetes . Confirmed diseases heart , liver kidney . Chronic inflammatory disease require medication . Pregnant nursing . Regular intake probiotic product ( 57 day per week last three month inclusion study ) .
